channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"
channel.description:
This week we talk about Batman, Software going to $0, Pricing again, Saas sucking, High school/depression, Business of Software Conference, A/B testing, Insurance, Andrey and me opening a coffee shop comic book store, Batman Arkham Origins, how we're the Seinfeld of bootstrap podcasting, Everpix closing, soup delivery, $7.95 cupcakes, our side projects that make us no money.
[Download the podcast and take a look at the show notes][1]
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-24-batman-voice/

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"
item.dc:creator: starr
item.description:
Yeah, it’s kind of like someone took the sun and put it on your desk. But seattle calls for extreme measures.

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Actually, I prefer my office be dark. I don’t even turn on the lights when I work at night. Darkness. Hoodie over headphones. Music to 11. Ready to code.

Read full topic

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"

item.description:
Just listened. Man, you guys need to get some Happy Lights.

http://www.amazon.com/Verilux-HappyLite-Deluxe-Sunshine-Simulator/dp/B0001ATEJ2

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Ah, awesome! We should haven’t known you’d have the data

Well hopefully you’ll see both our smiling faces this year.

Read full topic

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 24 - "Batman Voice"
item.dc:creator: robwalling
item.description:
Ian mentioned MicroConf and that he’d heard there are a lot of pre-launch founders in attendance. Since we have data on this topic I thought I’d share it. For MicroConf 2013, here is the breakdown:

  • 62% of attendees have launched
  • 28% are actively building their product (pre-launch)
  • 10% are in the idea phase

Another good show, gents!

Read full topic
